message: Put up your thoughts, found bugs, considerations about iOS5 beta here!
Against nda...not that anyone really cares about that :-P

Is the multiple tabs/pages in mobile safari not caching and having to reload when switching back and forth issue resolved?  In the presentation it seemed pretty fast for the iPad.  Wonder if it is the case for the iPhone as well.

I've noticed lots of things are broken. The Messages app is busted - especially if you leave it open and rotate/unlock a couple of times. I keep getting asked to join a wifi network that doesn't exist, I've noticed lots of loading bars are a bit crippled, every time I go into iCloud settings I get 'Verification error bad url'

Not to mention it absolutely devours the battery on the iPhone 4. iPad is a lot more stable, though at the same time I get the feeling some of the notifications stuff was an afterthought (an iPhone adaptation vs a genuine iPad version). iMessages works great there though. Really cool stuff.
Oh, and images don't sync up with their thumbnails for me either. Booo
@Lloyd did you lose the ability to zoom with your camera?
Yeah I just figured that out a little while ago. So far so good with iOS 5b
Nope - the slider has gone but it's pinch-to-zoom now
Am I missing the "read" receipts in iMessage?
You can turn off sending a read receipt - I've done it since I don't really want people to know I'm ignoring them
If you have read receipts turned on, it says "read 09/06/2011" below the message you sent. Only for iMessages, not SMS tho.
I think that the "Send as SMS" toggle is broken, cause I turned it off, but it's still letting me send SMS's, which I don't want to be able to do.
I think that toggle is just to allow you to send messages as SMS rather than iMessages when its not available. You will still send SMS's to non-iMessage supported numbers
Unable to log-on to iCloud, won't let me restore I keep getting "BAD URL" WTF? iOS beta 3 here
